name: @pucelle/lupos
description: A Typescript Transformer helps to compile lupos.js based projects.
author: pucelle

scripts.build: npm run build-cli && npm run build-web
scripts.test-win: cd tests && node ../cli/bin/luc && echo Compare git changes to get test result && del tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.test-mac: cd tests && node ../cli/bin/luc && echo Compare git changes to get test result && rm tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
